author: AceShowbiz.com
title: New 'Spectre' Photos Revealed
text:
Comments One of the photos shows the 007 agent and his new Bond girl weaving through the crowded streets of Tangiers in Morocco to track down the titular evil organization. 
Some new pictures of the upcoming James Bond movie " Spectre " have been debuted ahead of its theatrical release. Featured in the new issue of Entertainment Weekly magazine, the pictures highlight Daniel Craig 's Bond and Lea Seydoux 's Dr. Madeleine Swann in action while they try to extinguish the titular evil organization. One of the photos finds Bond and Swann weaving through the crowded streets of Tangiers to track down Spectre. The 007 agent is also seen among people wearing costumes during the Day of the Dead festival in Mexico City. There is also a glimpse at Marco Sciarra (Alessandro Cremona), an Italian hitman, who gives Bond some trouble in the city. As the mission continues, the British superspy is seen piloting a plane before he eventually walks out of the wrecked plane to shoot enemies. Aside from the action sequences, another photo shows Bond seducing Lucia Sciarra ( Monica Bellucci ) in a hotel room to infiltrate Spectre. In other news, "Spectre" stars attended a photocall for the movie at the Corinthia Hotel ballroom in London on Thursday, October 22. Craig was at the event, posing for photographers alongside his Bond girls Bellucci, Seydoux and Naomie Harris . The British star and the other actresses looked casual as they opted to wear minimal accessories. Craig and his co-star Christoph Waltz , who plays Bond's nemesis Franz Oberhauser, made an ice-breaking moment during the event. Craig hugged Waltz as he pretended to fall asleep on the English actor's shoulder. Craig is joined by the likes of Ben Whishaw , Ralph Fiennes and Dave Bautista in the cast. Directed by Sam Mendes, the movie will be released in the U.S. on November 6.
